General.Name: Selvas Ai Inc.
General.Description: Selvas AI Inc. develops and supplies HMI solutions based on the recognition technologies of handwriting, image, and voice. The company's solutions include HCI LAB a speech recognition and synthesis, handwriting recognition, and optical character recognition; healthcare lab for healthcare services based on artificial intelligence (AI) technology; medical lab for emergency medical system AI based non face to face remote treatment and emergency transportation; bio lab a CDM based smart clinical trial design support system; natural language processing integration lab that provides natural voice interface; mobility lab, which offers solutions for vehicles and mobility with voice control; and edu-tech lab for online education based on AI. Selvas AI Inc. serves medical, healthcare, automotive, education, finance, and accessibility industries. The company was formerly known as DIOTEK Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Selvas AI Inc. in September 2016. Selvas AI Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Daerung Techno Town 18th, 19, Seoul, South Korea
